overview: Meet Buzz & Poppy - two lovable bugs who are taking the world by swarm! Broadcast Internationally, Buzz & Poppy are adorable insects who learn big life lessons about honesty, sharing, obedience and much more. Featuring cutting-edge 3-D animation - just like today's hottest animated movies - each entertaining episode includes a key Bible verse to know and remember.
title: Buzz and Poppy
